name: Journey to the Pearly Gates (Limbo Cards)
name_original: Journey to the Pearly Gates (Limbo Cards)
description:
“So you’ve finally died and have sailed over the river Styx.  You are now in limbo, purgatory to be exact.”

“I’m not here to hand-hold you on your way to Heaven. You shall make this journey alone by yourself. Who you will meet, even I do not know. Make your way towards what your intuition guides. The fate you yearn for shall lead your way."

How to play

Place cards in between you and your opponent. When a card is on the board, it will automatically attack the minion across from it at the end of the turn. (A minion's attack is on the bottom left of the card). If there is no minion, then the enemy hero will take damage.  If a minion reaches zero health (Health is on the bottom right), it will be sent to the graveyard. If a player tries  to draw a card with no cards in their deck, the graveyard will be shuffled back into their deck. A minion will not attack the first turn it is played.

Each card has a cost (top right). A player has 8 willpower to spend each turn. At the start of your turn, your willpower returns to 8 and you draw a card. 

Certain cards have special effects. These can be seen by clicking on the card.

Once an enemy is defeated, you can let them go (green button) or kill them (red button). Killing them will give you a stronger card, but you will be judged for your actions. 

You can click on the cards in the decision panel to examine them too.

Made by Jonas Traweek, NvN, Tartles, Sincey, and RacingAndy. (AKA The Limbo Bars)
